name: Not Another Bullet Hell
description:
"Back again, are we?"

Ren, an incredibly mentally-unwell girl takes it upon herself to finally move past her many inner demons.

Venture through a troubled mind and help the girl make steps towards recovery.

Features:

- Blood.

- Visceral, satisfying, fast-paced combat reminiscent of both Touhou and Hotline Miami. Coat the arenas in blood. Cut your enemies into pieces.

- Smooth controls. Flow between each enemy and encounter like water.

- Four varied locations, all representative of different parts of Ren's psyche.

This game is a submission for the 2022 Bullet Hell Game Jam.

This game also covers considerably sensitive topics, particularly depression and self-harm. Proceed at your own discretion.
